name: Long Arm Of The Law (itch)
description:
A lone Sheriff bot, his arm taken from him, enters the lair of the bandit clan responsible on a quest to dispense justice and take back what’s his. Join us on a third person action-platformer, reminiscent of the early 2000 PlayStation era, as we delve into a western Robot themed world of Long Arm of the Law.

Created by a team of graduate students at Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy as a Capstone Thesis Project, this Game is being built with a team of 18. 

If you play online, please fill out our survey of what you think:
